data.name: errAlreadyInstructor
data.value: User {0} is already an instructor of user {1}

data.name: errAlreadyStudent
data.value: User {0} is already a student of user {1}

data.name: errCantTeachSelf
data.value: You can't be your own student or your own instructor.

data.name: errExpiredCertificate
data.value: Instructor's certificate has expired or is missing an expiration date.

data.name: errGetFailed
data.value: Unable to get endorsements for student {1} and/or instructor {2}; exception: {2}

data.name: errNeedCertificate
data.value: You must enter your certificate to be an instructor so that endorsements you create can include it.

data.name: errNoCertificate
data.value: Instructor for endorsement does not have a valid certificate specified.

data.name: errNoStudentOrInstructor
data.value: Must specify either a student or an instructor.

data.name: errNoTitle
data.value: Endorsement does not have required title.

data.name: errWrongAddress
data.value: This request is for a different email address

data.name: InvitationMessageSubject
data.comment: {0} is the name of the app, {1} is the name of the requestor.

data.name: EmailSenderAddress
data.comment: E.g., From "John Smith on behalf of Alice Johnson"

data.name: ViewStudentLogbookUnauthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to view this logbook!

data.name: ViewStudentNoSuchStudent
data.value: No valid student of yours was requested.

data.name: errSignExpiredCertificate
data.value: You must have an unexpired CFI Certificate to sign a flight.

data.name: errSignNoCertificate
data.value: You must have an unexpired CFI Certificate to sign a flight.

data.name: errSignNotInstructorOfStudent
data.value: You are not authorized to sign this student's logbook entries. Please set up a student-instructor relationship first.

data.name: FlightSignatureInvalid
data.value: Flight has been modified since being signed; signature is no longer valid.

data.name: FlightSignatureTemplate
data.comment: e.g. "Signed on {date} by {CFI Name} (CFI #1234, Expiration Mar 22, 2013)"

data.name: errSignNotAuthorized
data.value: The pilot has not authorized you to view or sign that flight.

data.name: FlightSignatureValid
data.value: The signature for this flight is valid.

data.name: errSignNoDigitizedSignature
data.value: You must provide a digitized signature of the CFI

data.name: EditEndorsementDisclaimer
data.value: These endorsements are shown for informational and record-keeping purposes only.

data.name: EditEndorsementRequiredField
data.value: {0} is a required field. Please type in a value.

data.name: errAcceptDisclaimer
data.value: You must indicate your acceptance to continue.

data.name: SignDisclaimerAgreement1
data.value: %APP_NAME% cannot verify that a signature is actually from the instructor it claims to be from.

data.name: SigningSuccess
data.value: The flight has been successfully signed

data.name: SignReEnterPassword
data.value: Please enter the password for CFI {0}:
data.comment: {0} is the name of the CFI

data.name: SignedFlightDisclaimer
data.value: %APP_NAME% provides facilities for an instructor to sign a logbook on another pilot's behalf, with that pilot's permission. While every attempt is made to ensure the integrity of this process, it has not been vetted by the FAA or other similar agencies, and may therefore not be acceptible to these agencies.

data.name: SignDisclaimerAgreement2
data.value: By using this, you agree that the instructor identified by the license/certificate (and not you or anybody else) is the one who is actually producing the handwritten signature.

data.name: SignFlightIgnore
data.comment: Ignore a request to sign a flight.

data.name: SignRequestSubject
data.value: Request to sign logbook entries for {0} on {1}
data.comment: Subject line for a request to sign logbook entries. {0} is student name, {1} is app name.

data.name: errUpdatePilotPrefs
data.value: Update your CFI Certificate and Expiration

data.name: SignFlightCopy
data.comment: {0} is the name of the CFI

data.name: errNoBackDating
data.value: You cannot back-date an endorsement so far in the past.

data.name: CFISigsLinkLabel
data.value: More information on the use of digital signatures/endorsements (English only).

data.name: NoExistingEndorsements
data.value: There are no existing endorsements to display

data.name: errCantDeleteMemberEndorsement
data.value: You cannot delete this endorsement because it is in the logbook of another pilot in the system. Endorsements cannot be revoked.

data.name: ExternalEndorsementConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this? (The student will still have the endorsement record in whatever form you originally gave it to them; this will simply delete your record.)

data.name: ExternalEndorsementDeleteTooltip
data.value: Delete this record of an endorsement you have given.

data.name: ExternalEndorsementDisclaimer
data.value: This is a record of an endorsement that you have given outside of %APP_NAME%. The recipient was not a member of %APP_NAME% when it was created and did not receive a copy of it from %APP_NAME%.

data.name: RequestSignatureReSign
data.value: This flight has been previously signed. Requesting a new signature will remove the old signature.

data.name: StudentNameTemplate
data.comment: {0} is the comments in the student's logbook , {1} are any other comments/remarks from the CFI

data.name: errTitleRequired
data.value: Please provide a title for the endorsement.

data.name: DigitalEndorsementDisclaimer
data.value: Important information about the validity of digital endorsements.

data.name: OwnedEndorsementConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this? THE INSTRUCTOR WILL HAVE TO ISSUE A NEW ENDORSEMENT AND CANNOT BACK-DATE IT!

data.name: OwnedEndorsementDeleteTooltip
data.value: Delete this endorsement. BE CAREFUL - this is permanent

data.name: errBothScribbleAndCFI
data.value: Endorsement has both digitized scribble signature and associated CFI user.

data.name: errInstructorBadPassword
data.value: Please enter the correct password for this account

data.name: errInstructorPasswordRequiredToEndorse
data.value: The instructor must provide a password to issue this endorsement

data.name: AdHocSignatureTooltip
data.value: This instructor is not in the list of your known instructors, so a scribble signature will be offered

data.name: AC135_43SICSignoffTemplate
data.value: I certify that [SIC] served as an SIC in accordance with § 61.159(c) on the following flight: [Route] on [Date].
